line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: This script ensures all stock exchanges are running the stock updater.
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Global Stock Exchange Monitor now running version: %s', $Version, null, null, null, null
* Really, this is just a bunch of stocks.
* 0 : Stock exchange sectors. This assumes that theres only one exchange per sector
* 1 - Market capitalization (detirmines share value which gets min and max)
* 12 - Current Trend (Current trend: -5 to 5 per tick)
* 13 - Trend Ticks (how many ticks does the trend last)
* 120 is the lower limit to elminnate integer wrapping issues in the menu
* the issue is that the min on 120 is 24, due to div by 5 for min
* and max credit per transfer is 500,000,000. 500,000,000 div less than 24 is larger than integer max
* The stock exchange was found in the index, so we do nothing, it already has its stocks.
* if not get global variable: name='LitQB.StockExchange.IsRunning'
* We've come across a stock exchange that is not initialized.
* Let's abort this script, and re run it to get the data

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: This script ensures all stock exchanges are running the stock updater.
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Global Stock Exchange Monitor now running version: %s', $Version, null, null, null, null
Really, this is just a bunch of stocks.
0 : Stock exchange sectors. This assumes that theres only one exchange per sector
1 - Market capitalization (detirmines share value which gets min and max)
12 - Current Trend (Current trend: -5 to 5 per tick)
13 - Trend Ticks (how many ticks does the trend last)
120 is the lower limit to elminnate integer wrapping issues in the menu
the issue is that the min on 120 is 24, due to div by 5 for min
and max credit per transfer is 500,000,000. 500,000,000 div less than 24 is larger than integer max
The stock exchange was found in the index, so we do nothing, it already has its stocks.
if not get global variable: name='LitQB.StockExchange.IsRunning'
We've come across a stock exchange that is not initialized.
Let's abort this script, and re run it to get the data
